description: Navigate to 尾上町（バス）. Walk down the narrow street until you reach the intersection with the main road, marked by a 'GINDACO' store on the right corner. Turn right onto the main road. The Onoe-cho bus stop will be a short distance ahead on the left side of the sidewalk.
agent_refined_route: Head northwest on the narrow street [37m] -> Turn Right onto the main road [14m]
agent_concise_description: Walk down the narrow street until you reach the intersection with the main road, marked by a 'GINDACO' store on the right corner. Turn right onto the main road. The Onoe-cho bus stop will be a short distance ahead on the left side of the sidewalk.
